The Gentle Sisters was a name given to a small group of goddesses of the Faerûnian pantheon Selûne, Eldath, Sune, and Mielikki. They were not actually sisters and the name was bestowed on them by "less gentle beings".
When the gods were cast down to the mortal world by Ao during the Time of Troubles in the , the Gentle Sisters were the only ones who prayed to the overgod for guidance on how they should comport themselves. Yet they fell like the others, arriving separately on Toril, though Ao gave each his answer afterwards.
